mapper.select: select id, post_user, message, dt from posts INNER JOIN contributor ON posts.contributor_id = contributor.id
select posts.id, post_user, message, dt from posts LEFT JOIN contributor ON posts.contributor_id = contributor.id where posts.id = #{id}
select posts.id, post_user message, dt, topic_id from posts LEFT JOIN topic ON posts.topic_id = topic.id LEFT JOIN contributor ON posts.contributor_id = contributor.id where topic_id = #{topic_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (id, contributor_id, message, dt, topic_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{contributor_id}, #{message}, #{dt}, #{topic_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET message = #{message} WHERE id = #{id}
